Posts.Content: Feb 17, 2010 12:25PM Joyce64 wrote: Well, I decided to take tamoxifen and will see my oncologist in 6 weeks to take tests to see how my liver is. 2nd day and so far, good. No major side effects yet. I have changed my diet - more vegetables and fruits - Please let me know your decision and how you are doing. I did not want to rely on any medicine especially one that has to be taken for 5 years. But, my oncologists told me that I am not married to tamoxifen and if I am unable to take the side effects, I can stop. But, I cannot miss any mammogram and any paps. Read some of the articles they recommend and I find it very helpful.
